processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value to find divisors

advice.text: You already read the number and set sum to 0; focus on translating the remaining comments into code.
Plan the loop: iterate from 1 to n and decide when to add the current value to sum using a divisibility check.
Implement a for loop that visits each i from 1 to n; if i divides n (use the remainder test), add i to sum, then print the final sum.
